channel.title: I want to learn private server language
channel.description:
I know its Java, but from what i have heard, Private servers only use 10% of the whole language of Java. So there is no need for me to learn a whole book of Java, i just want to know what private servers use
Anyone got any advice/links?
IF you cant understand what i mean, post and ill try to explain myself better.
Thanks in advance! :)

item.title: I want to learn private server language

item.title: I want to learn private server language
item.dc:creator: @legend_rene legend rene
item.description:
@legend_rene wrote:

Booleans, ints, methods, statements and that other stuff isnt just private server Java lol , additems and that other stuff is also used for other Java based programs , not just this RS2 shit…

Read full topic
item.source: I want to learn private server language

item.title: I want to learn private server language
item.dc:creator: @ShadowShaft ShadowShaft
item.description:
@ShadowShaft wrote:

Boolean explained.

[code]public boolean example = false;//when you join the server it doesn’t do the action.always declare this

public boolean example() {//exmaple = name of boolean
//action
return true; //when the aciton is done its true
}
return false; //else it doesnt do the action
}[/code]

Voids explained.

a void is actually a packet of action(s)

public void example() {//exmaple = name of void //action } //packet of actions

Statements explained

[code]if(yougetdrunk) {//if you get drunk
getKicked == true; //you get kicked if you get drunk
} else { //if your NOT drunk
continue = true; //you can continu.
}

if(yougetdrunk) {
getKicked = true;
else if(yourNOTdrunk) {
continue = true;
}[/code]

= in statement becomes ==
& in statement becomes &&

Ints explained.

[code]public int example = 0; //you start with 0
public int exmaple;//this int is not always the same, when you load of ints like pk points

if(openedDoor) { //when you open the door its 1
exmaple = 1;
} else { //if door is closed its 0
example = 0;

public void openedDoor() {
if(example == 1) {
spawnOpenendoor();
}[/code]

Some exmaples.

Read full topic

item.title: I want to learn private server language
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Olan14 I Am Olan14
item.description:
@I_Am_Olan14 wrote:

[quote=“TeleNubby, post:4, topic:124246”][quote author=philowns link=topic=174098.msg1605542#msg1605542 date=1184718174]
Great thanks alot Now maybe i can contribute to this community. Lol. :rolleyes:

EDIT: By the way are booleans & ints the same as SCAR? Boolean = true/false? If i remember correctly, i might be wrong
[/quote]
Yes

Booleans = Returns True or False
Int = Integer[/quote]

You mean an ‘int’ returns an Integer value.
You did the method that returns a boolean value correct though.

Read full topic
